item.title: If Anyone’s Destroying The Judiciary’s ‘Legitimacy,’ It’s Chief Justice John Roberts
item.description: Roberts' attempts to preserve what he views as the judiciary's 'legitimacy' are only destroying its credibility with the American people.

item.title: President Not Allowed To Solve Problems He Was Elected To Fix, Judges Order

item.title: Yes, Trump Should Ignore Rogue Judges

item.title: ‘Judicial Coup’ Threatens To Kneecap Trump’s America First Agenda
item.description: The United States is facing what El Salvador's President Nayib Bukele described as a "judicial coup."

item.title: West Virginia, Wyoming Secure Elections With Ranked-Choice Voting Prohibitions
item.description: GOP governors of West Virginia and Wyoming signed bills on Tuesday prohibiting the use of ranked-choice voting in their states' elections.
